snippet: And, officials warned, if another big storm hits the region — one is expected over the weekend — it could take even longer.
abstract: Authorities in Boston area say Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority, one of country's largest mass transit systems, will not be fully operational for 30 days due to record snowstorms and freezing conditions that have hit region; announcement draws condemnation from commuters.
lead_paragraph: And, officials warned, if another big storm hits the region — one is expected over the weekend — it could take even longer.

headline.main: 30 More Problem Days, Boston Transit Chief Says
headline.print_headline: 30 More Problem Days, Boston Transit Chief Says
